summary: This bill, the FBI Whistleblower Protection Enhancement Act of 2025, aims to strengthen protections for whistleblowers within the Federal Bureau of Investigation. It amends existing law to prevent personnel actions against FBI employees who report wrongdoing, clarify the appeals process for whistleblower retaliation, and require the Attorney General to inform employees of their rights. It also mandates policies to prevent conflicts of interest in investigations related to whistleblower reprisal.
